# GCInputDualShockTouchpadTwo

**Global Variable**

The name of the second finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputDualShockTouchpadTwo: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **touchpadSecondary**: The location of the player’s secondary finger on the touchpad.

## DualShock controller button names

- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadButton**: The name of the button functionality of the DualShock 4 touchpad.
- **GCInputDualShockTouchpadOne**: The name of the first finger element to touch down on the DualShock 4 touchpad.
